name: Automania
overview: Wally works on a car assembly line. In this platform type game, the player must help Wally build a series of ten cars. Each car consist of six parts that are distributed all around the stock room which must be collected and at the assembly area, be placed in their correct positions on the car. The factory is populated with robots, bouncing tires, and air cooling blades which kill on contact so it's going to be a long working day.
